Package it.unipr.sowide.actodes.configuration

Class Configuration

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unipr.sowide.actodes.configuration.PropertiesGroup
      • it.unipr.sowide.actodes.configuration.Configuration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public final class Configuration
extends PropertiesGroup
    The Configuration class manages the information about the configuration of an actor space.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getPropertiesGroup

        public PropertiesGroup getPropertiesGroup​(java.lang.String k)

      • loadProperties

        public boolean loadProperties​(java.lang.String f)
        Loads a set of properties from a properties file in the application configuration.
        Overrides:
        loadProperties in class PropertiesGroup
        Parameters:
        f - the properties file path.
        Returns:
        true if the operation is successful. Note that an application can contain specific properties groups maintaining the information for configuring a specific object (e.g., a behavior). Each properties group is identified in the properties file with a property whose value it the path of the properties file maintaining the information of such a properties group. Moreover, the properties file, defining the application configuration, can contain a property named "properties.groups and whose value of this property contains the list of the property keys (separated by commas) identifying a set of properties groups. If this property is present, the loading operation also loads the declared properties groups. If it is not present, each properties group can be loaded in the application configuration by using the related key.
        See Also:
        PropertiesGroup

      • start

        public void start()
        Configures the actor space and starts its execution.
